subject: Sports Injuries
Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods has minor injuries to his left knee and Achilles’ tendon that will keep him out of the Wells Fargo Championship next week at Quail Hollow in Charlotte, N.C.
snippet: Tiger Woods has minor injuries to his left knee and Achilles’ tendon that will keep him out of the Wells Fargo Championship next week at Quail Hollow in Charlotte, N.C.
